user_review: It was a good dish and a good experience
ai_response: Thank you for your feedback! We're so pleased to hear you had a good dish and a good experience with us. We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts.
ai_summary: The customer found both the dish and the overall experience to be good, resulting in a 3-star rating.
recommended_action: Identify specific opportunities to enhance the dish or experience to elevate it beyond "good" and encourage higher customer ratings in the future.

ai_response: I'm truly sorry to hear that your recent visit was disappointing, with average food, a long wait time, and nothing special standing out. That's certainly not the experience we aim to provide. We really appreciate you taking the time to share this valuable feedback, and we'll be looking into these areas for improvement.

recommended_action: Investigate and implement operational improvements to reduce customer wait times.
